Edhy Prabowo Mau Rombak Kebijakan Warisan Susi, Ini Daftarnya
06 Nov 2019, 12:15 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan Edhy Prabowo mengaku menerima banyak keluhan terkait kebijakan yang ada selama ini. Untuk itu dirinya akan melakukan revisi peraturan menteri yang merupakan warisan dari pendahulunya, Susi Pudjiastuti."Dari 10 hari saya menjabat banyak yang minta regulasi dikoreksi. Akan saya sampaikan setelah pada waktunya nanti, yang jelas ada rencana untuk merevisi demi kepentingan masyarakat, pembudidaya ikan, nelayan, petambak garam dan pembudaya lainnya," ujarnya di Gedung DPR RI, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Edhy mengaku masih merahasikan peraturan apa yang direvisinya nanti. Namun sepertinya akan ada lebih dari satu peraturan yang akan direvisi.Meski tak menyebutkan secara gamblang, Edhy mencontohkan peraturan yang selama ini dikeluhkan, misalnya terkait aturan penjualan kepiting yang harus memenuhi berat minimal 150 gram.Aturan itu tertuang dalam Surat Edaran Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan Nomor 18 Tahun 2015 tentang Penangkapan Lobster, Kepiting, dan Rajungan."Ada kan kepiting harus 150 gram yang boleh dibawa. Tapi ada kepiting budi daya yang soft shell (kepiting soka) itu tidak perlu sampai 150 gram sudah bisa dijual. Ini juga perlu kami kaji, nggak perlu lama-lama," terangnya.Menurut Edhy pengaturan batasan berat kepiting untuk dijual itu seharusnya dibedakan antara yang tangkap dan budi daya. Menurutnya untuk kepiting budi daya tidak perlu diatur."Kalau alam mungkin boleh dapat perlakuan, tapi kan budi daya tidak. Ada kekhawatiran memang takut jadi modus, tapi loh kita kan ada alat kontrol. Sebelum dia diterbangkan ada surat dari karantina ada pengawasan dari PSDKP," terangnya.Selain itu, Edhy juga menyinggung soal aturan penggunaan alat tangkap ikan. Menurutnya selama ini aturan pelarangan penggunaan alat tangkap tertentu justru juga turut mematikan nelayan kecil.Edhy juga menyinggung soal kebijakan larangan alih muatan ikan (transhipment) di laut. Menurutnya kebijakan itu mematikan pebudidaya ikan kerapu, lantaran tidak ada kapal yang mau mengangkut hasil budi dayanya."Ini semua sudah masuk dalam radar kami, radar saya," tambahnya.Dia mengatakan, bulan ini sudah dimulai untuk persiapan revisi kebijakan di KKP. Diharapkan selesai pada Desember 2019 sehingga awal tahun bisa keluar revisi kebijakan yang dimaksud."Sehingga tahun baru ada hadiah buat nelayan kita," tuturnya. Edhy Prabowo Wants to Overhaul Susi's Legacy Policy, Here's the List
Nov 6 2019, 12:15 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries Edhy Prabowo claimed to have received many complaints related to the existing policies. For this reason, he will revise the ministerial regulation which is the legacy of his predecessor, Susi Pudjiastuti. "Of the 10 days I served, many requested regulations to be corrected. I will submit it in due time, which clearly has plans to revise it in the interests of the community, fish farmers, fishermen, salt farmers and other civilizers, "he said at the Indonesian Parliament Building, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). But it seems that there will be more than one regulation that will be revised. Even though it does not mention clearly, Edhy exemplifies the regulations that have been complained about, for example related to crab sales rules which must meet a minimum weight of 150 grams. The rules are contained in Circular of the Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries Number 18 of 2015 concerning Catching Lobster, Crabs, and Swimming. "There are 150 grams of crabs that can be taken. But there are soft shell crabs that do not need to be up to 150 grams can be sold. This also needs to be examined by us. "No need for a long time," he explained. According to Edhy, the weight limits of crabs for sale should be distinguished between those caught and cultivation. According to him, for crab cultivation, it does not need to be regulated. "If nature may be able to be treated, but cultivation does not. There are fears of fear of being a mode, but we have controls. Before he was flown, there was a letter from quarantine, there was supervision from PSDKP, "he explained. In addition, Edhy also mentioned the rules regarding the use of fishing gear. According to him so far the rules forbidding the use of certain fishing gear actually also killed small fishermen. Edhy also mentioned the policy of prohibiting transhipment at sea. According to him the policy was deadening grouper fish farmers, because no ship would want to transport the results of his cultivation. "This has all entered our radar, my radar," he added. He said, this month had begun to prepare for policy revision at the KKP. "It is expected to be completed by December 2019 so that the beginning of the year the revised policy can come out." So that the new year there is a gift for our fishermen, "he said. Check out the video "Imitate Susi, Edhy Prabowo Wants to Sink a Fishing Boat Vessel" [Gambas: Video 20second] (das / ara)
